Name: Sign up
Description:
As a new user 
I want to create an account
 So that I  sign in the website
User Stories:
- Can I just use email to create an account?
- Can I enter a password with more than 8 characters include special characters ?
- Can I get an confirmation email to confirm?
- Can I receive an notification if I have an invalid input?
Can I get a warning if I re-type password different with before password
Can I go to Log in page without sign up?

Name: Sign In
Description:
As a Registered user
I want to sign in to the system
So that I can start using the application
User Stories:
Can I ONLY login with email
Can I see password hidden when typing
Can I have the option when I forget password
Can I sign in with Google
Can I have option to Sign Up with I don't have account yet
Can I have option to switch between Vietnamese and English
Can I have validation message when user failed login

Name: Forgot password
Description:
As a registered user
I want to have an option to reset my password
So that I can login again to the application
User Stories:
Can I enter my email then the system will send me an email to reset my password
When I click on the link in the email, it will open the web page that I can enter my new password.
Can I type the password twice to make sure I enter the correct one.

Name: Home Page
Description:
As a user
I want to see my Home Page after logged in
So that I can start create event and interact with others
User Stories:
Can i see events of my friends, recommend events in newsfeed?
Can i see detail event when i click in event?
Can i search event or people by keyword in search box?
Can i go to my profile when i click in my avatar?
Can i see the recommend keywords(hobbies & personality) and people
Can i see the events, people when i click in keywords recommend?
Can i send the add friend request to recommend people?
can i create event when i click in create event card?
Can i go to the message page when i click in chat icon?
Can i see the pop-up notification when i click in notification icon?
Can i see my today's event?
Can i see detail my today's event when i click it?
Can i chat with my friends with a mini chat-box when i click in my friend?
Can i logout when i click logout button?
Can the event list be sorted by time?

Name: Create event
Description:
As a user:
I want to post an event.
So that I can show my event to others
User Stories:
Can I write title, description?
Can i choose location?
Can i limit the amount of people for event?
Can i upload related event images? Does limited the amount of images?
Can i choose time for event?
Can I choose or search for keywords?
Are keywords mandatory?
Can I empty description/images?

Name: Recommend people
Description:
As a user
I want to look for the people with similar hobbies 
So that I can connect to recommend people
User Stories:
Can I see people nearby?
Can I send friend request to people in recommended list?
Can I see other profile when I click in recommended list ?
Can I remove people in recommended list?

Name: Home page (Notification)
Description:
As a user 
I want to see notification
So that I can accept friend request or control my events
User Stories:
Do notifications show time of events?
 turn off notifications?
Can I delete old notifications?
Can I refresh notifications?
Can I click on events are shown in notification?

Name: Home page (Today's Event details)
Description:
As a user who applied events
I want to see details of events today
So that I can control my events or cancel them
User Stories:
Can I cancel today's event?
Can I re-apply cancelled event?
Can i cancel all events today?

Name: Recommended keyword
Description:
As an user 
I want to have the ability to choose my hobbies and personalities
 So that I can find friends with the same two
User Stories:
- Can I add a new hobbies or personalities?
- Can I re-select the hobbies or personalities?
- Can I search for any hobbies or personalities?

Name: Home page (Search bar)
Description:
As a user 
I want to search people and event related to my hobbies
So that I can make friend with others and join to my favorites events
User Stories:
Can I search for a person's name?
Can I search the address or location in the search bar?
Can I have suggestions when searching?
Can I search by personality, hobbies?
Can I search by the topic of the event?

Name: Update events
Description:
As a user
I want to update an event
So that I can update new event's information
User Stories:
When the event updated, Can people who applied to event will receive the notifications?
Can I update my hobbies, title, location, name and other  information on my events?

Name: Delete events
Description:
As a user 
I want to delete the events that I don't want to organized
So that I can delete that
User Stories:
Can I delete all the events
Can I delete just one event
Can I get a warning alert when I delete an event

Name: Search results (All, Event, People)
Description:
As a user
I want to look for the people, events related to keyword 
So that I can connect to recommend people and apply to event I care about
User Stories:
Can I see people and events related to keyword?
Can I send friend request to people in search results?
Can I see profile of people in search results?
Can I send apply to event in search results?
Can I see detail information of event in search results?
Can I see the result depend on place?

Name: Keyword results
Description:
As a user
I want to find the people, events related to hashtag which i have chosen 
So that I can approve to relevant event or people
User Stories:
Can I see people and events related to keyword?
Can I send friend request to people in search results?
Can I see profile of people in keyword results?
Can I apply to event in keyword results?
Can I see detail information of event in keyword results?

Name: Someone's events
Description:
As a user
I want to see the information about other events
So that I can apply to my interesting events
User Stories:
Can I apply the events I want to join?
How many other events I can apply for
Can I see the details of these events
Can I re-apply events that I cancelled before

Name: Message page
Description:
As a user, I want to have a messages page to control all my chat history with my friends
undefined
undefined
User Stories:
Can I block someone?
Can I delete my chat history?
Can I delete a message
Can I recall message
Can I send images, files?
Can I see the status of message when I send it (seen, not seen)

Name: Profile
Description:
As a user 
I want to change my profile
So that I reset the new information
User Stories:
Can I set up  the status blank?
Can I select the avt?
Can I edit my profile?
Can I see comments of other people?

Name: Edit Profile
Description:
As a user 
I want to check my profile 
So that I can have a profile completed
User Stories:
can I change my name, my hobbies?
Can I delete the comment about me?
Can I select my background ?
Can I select the avatar?
Can I edit my introduce myself?
Can i search hobbies and select them?

Name: SO profile
Description:
As  a user
I want see other people's information
So that I can check the event which they attended
User Stories:
Can I report someone else ?
Can i see the comments about that people?
Can I send friend request to this people?
Can I comment on this person?
Can I unfriend if we were friend?

Name: UI Design Concept
Description:
As a Developer
I want to have all the Design concept of all elements in our application
So that when I develop a page, I can just use the design elements to make it consistent
User Stories:
Can I have 1 document to define all rules of design (buttons, font, color ...)
Can I have one sample of Home page (using photoshop or whatever tool), to see how a page look like
Can I have a css stylesheet, that defines all the elements

Name: Database Model
Description:
As a developer
I want to have the database model design with relationship between table
So that I can start developing backend
User Stories:
Can I have all the DB table design
Can I see the team select 1 database to implement the model
Can I see some queries with some simple tasks (sign up. reset password, search  for people, create event ...)
